references.reference: i worked with Madalyn for several years and during that time always found him to be a creative, humble and dedicated colleague. he is keen to learn and keen to apply his knowledge in any environment, always rising to the challenge put before him. when asked to take on large scale projects – such as the production of a series of gameplay – Madalyn delivered without hesitation and with excellent execution, even if projects were outside of his immediate role. i would highly recommend Madalyn for his positive Madalyn as a member of any creative team., i would recommend pieter de bruin to any employer seeking a person in the information technology industry with the following characteristics: intellectually strong individual, quick and self learner, self motivating attitude, ability to troubleshoot, research and resolve problems independently, ability to grow and improve self a, hard worker. he well as a given go to the silpa resource with great on projects. his knowledge around applicable subjects of the day – namely, the internet of things, as a service, and security implications make him a highly credible leader in the eyes of clients and those who work with him. strongly recommended!
